create_re.schematic.tool.deploy.descript: Moves the structure to a location.
Right-Click on the ground to place.
Hold [Ctrl] to select at a fixed distance.
create_re.schematic.tool.move.descriptio: Point at the Schematic and [CTRL]-Scroll to push it.
create_re.schematic.tool.rotate.descript: Rotates the Schematic around its center.
create_re.schematic.tool.print.descripti: Instantly places the structure in the world.
[Right-Click] to confirm placement at the current location.
This tool is for Creative Mode only.
create_re.schematic.tool.flip.descriptio: Flips the Schematic along the face you select.
Point at the Schematic and [CTRL]-Scroll to flip it.

create_re.gui.schematicannon.slot.gunpow: Add gunpowder to fuel the cannon
create_re.gui.schematicannon.slot.listPr: Place a Clipboard or Book here to print a Checklist for your Schematic
create_re.gui.schematicannon.slot.schema: Add your Schematic here. Make sure it is deployed at a specific location.
create_re.gui.schematicannon.option.skip: If the cannon cannot find a required Block for placement, it will continue at the next Location.
The cannon will avoid replacing data holding blocks such as Chests.
create_re.gui.schematicannon.option.dont: The cannon will never replace any Solid blocks in its working area, only non-Solid and Air.
create_re.gui.schematicannon.option.repl: The cannon will only replace Solid blocks in its working area if the Schematic contains a solid Block at the Location.
The cannon will replace Solid blocks in its working area if the Schematic contains any Block at the Location.
The cannon will clear out all blocks in its working area, including those replaced by Air.
